cgcloud__CP_Pricing_Condition_Template__.description: The pricing condition template object is used to define what is to be calculated in a step of a calculation schema.

LastReferencedDate.description: Most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: Most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

RecordTypeId.description: Represents the record type of the record.

cgcloud__Base__c.description: Defines the item or product attribute that is to be used as the base for several pricing functionalities such as scale determination or condition value distribution to items.

cgcloud__Condition_Level__c.description: Defines whether the complex pricing condition type describes header-level or item-level conditions.

cgcloud__Decimal_Places__c.description: Defines the number of remaining decimal places, if rounding applies.

cgcloud__Description__c.description: Description based on the user-specified language.

cgcloud__Distribute_To_Item__c.description: Defines whether the found or calculated condition value is to be distributed among the sales document items.

cgcloud__Item_Grouping__c.description: Specifies that the condition applies to a group of items (group condition).

cgcloud__Manual_Source_Attribute__c.description: Defines the field from which the manual condition is taken.

cgcloud__Manual__c.description: Defines whether the condition type requires manual editing of the condition.

cgcloud__Meta_Type__c.description: Reference to the meta type of the complex pricing condition template.

cgcloud__Rounding__c.description: Defines whether the system rounds the calculation result after the calculation step has been applied.

cgcloud__Sales_Org__c.description: Describes the sales organization to which the pricing condition template belongs.

cgcloud__Scale_Type__c.description: Specifies whether scale conditions apply and, if Scale Type is not empty, how to interpret the scale.

cgcloud__Search_Strategy__c.description: Defines the search strategy of the calculation schema step.

cgcloud__Sign__c.description: Defines the leading sign of condition values.

cgcloud__Sort__c.description: Controls the position of templates in overviews and wizards.

cgcloud__Subtotal__c.description: Specifies the pricing templates that are used to define subtotal condition templates.
